sources.title: Across The Line | Full Crime Drama Movie | Free Movie 2025 | NHL Hockey Sports Urban Movie
sources.description:
Stephan James (Race, Shots Fired, If Beale Street Could Talk) is Mattie, a talented hockey player selected by a top NHL team, but his plans are jeopardized by his hustling brother (Shamier Anderson - Labyrinth, Wynonna Earp, Shots Fired) and the corrosive racial tension at his school.  Sarah Jeffery (Shades of Blue) is Jayme, a beautiful young woman who must decide which world she belongs in.

2015.  Stars: Stephan James, Sarah Jeffery, Steven Love | Director: Director X | Writer: Floyd Kane

sources.title: Across the Line: The Exodus of Charlie Wright | Full Crime Drama Movie
sources.description:
***This film is under license from ITN Distribution. All rights reserved.***

Across the Line - The story centers on Charlie, a Los Angeles billionaire financial whiz who goes into self-imposed exile in Tijuana after his empire is revealed to have been a Ponzi scheme. While looking for the woman he abandoned there 25 years before, Charlie is pursued by a Mexican gangster, a federal agent and thugs sent by a former client looking to retrieve his money.

2010
Stars: Aidan Quinn, Andy Garcia, Mario Van Peebles

metadata.Plot: A young, black NHL hopeful living in a racially divided Nova Scotian community finds his career prospects in jeopardy when tensions in his community come to a head.
metadata.Actors: Stephan James, Sarah Jeffery, Steven Love
